column5: Well its been along time after having my Dad in the Hospital for 2 1/2 months it felt great to be fishing again on the ice.  I fished a tournament in Alexandria Ontario.Nice prizes checkout the website.I would have liked to have gone to the Montreal outdoors show to meet up with Mercer but sometimes fishing has its priorities. Sorry no pics I left the camera in GlennK's truck and when your are trying to win a tournament well the camera was forgotten.  Alex Fishing Derby  Prizes started at 51st place and up.51st place pike was 2.447lbs and mine was 2.440lbs no prize for me there is always next year.  It just felt great to be fishing again.  MTP
Sounds like you had a good time Mike Always nice to be out on the hard stuff Thanks for sharing Jacques
It could have been worse Mike, you could have ended up in 23rd place! Glad you got out!

SlowPoke  , you would of thought 52 place would get you two pairs lol ... Ya cant win them all Mike but its good to see ya get out,k hope your Dad is over this and he can get out with you again soon ...
Glad you were able to get out and have a good time Mike. Two and a half months is a long time to be in the hospital. I hope you both can get out fishing together soon.
